reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting the development of a judicial framework for the Philippines' first National Competition Policy

description.narrative: The project is designed to support the Philippines to set in place its first National Policy for Competition. Its successful implementation hinges heavily on setting the necessary judicial framework, developed through bilateral exchange between the Supreme Court of the Philippines and the UK counterpart competition agency, with training of relevant judicial bodies; thus levelling the economic playing field among local and foreign players through competitive policies in key sectors and boosting sustainable and inclusive growth in the country.
